item.title: Cloud Services - Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Identified Issue with Sage Customer Support

We identified an issue preventing Sage Customer Support from reading and sending chat messages to global customers for multiple products. Engaged with third-party for updates.

Feb 22, 09:37 UTC
Identified - We identified an issue preventing Sage Customer Support from reading and sending chat messages to our global customers, when using the products listed below:

Sage HR
AutoEntry
GoProposal
Sage Earth
Sage Inventory Planner
Futrli
Sage Business Cloud Payroll International
Sage Network Inbox

We are engaged with our third-party, Intercom, waiting for updates.

Feb 22, 09:24 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating a potential issue with the service. An update will be provided within 30 minutes.

item.title: Sage Business Cloud Payroll Professional - Degraded Performance
item.content:encoded:
[Medium] - Potential Service Issue

We are currently investigating a potential issue with the service and will provide an update within 30 minutes.

Feb 22, 09:07 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating a potential issue with the service. An update will be provided within 30 minutes.

item.content:encoded:

We are currently investigating.

Feb 22, 07:55 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating a potential issue with the service. An update will be provided within 30 minutes.

item.title: Brightpearl - Partial Outage
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Order Data Processing Issue

Summary: Shopify order data for US customers is not syncing to Brightpearl. The issue is under investigation.

Feb 21, 21:49 UTC
Update - We identified an issue where US customers' Shopify order data has not been processed to Brightpearl. All other product functionality is performing as expected.

We are currently investigating.

Feb 21, 21:29 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating a potential issue with the service. An update will be provided within 30 minutes.

item.title: Sage DPW Cloud - Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
[High] - Sage DPW Cloud Maintenance

Summary: Sage DPW Cloud will be undergoing 11 hours of maintenance on Sunday, February 25th, 2024, making the service unavailable.

THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 25, 07:00 - 18:00 UTC

Feb 21, 15:23 UTC
Scheduled - Sage DPW Cloud will be undergoing maintenance on Sunday, February 25th, 2024 for 11 hours between 08:00 CET and 21:00 CET.

The service will be unavailable during this scheduled time.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.

Thank you. The Sage Team

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bei Ihrer Sage DPW Cloud werden am Sonntag, 25. Februar 2024, zwischen 08:00 MEZ und 21:00 MEZ. Wartungsarbeiten durchgeführt.

Service ist während dieser geplanten Zeit nicht verfügbar.

Wir entschuldigen uns für etwaige Unannehmlichkeiten.

Mit freundlichen Grüßen, Das Sage-Team

item.title: Sage Business Cloud Accounting Global - Scheduled Mainenance
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 24, 17:00 - 20:00 UTC

Feb 21, 12:04 UTC
Scheduled - Sage Business Cloud Accounting Global will undergo essential system maintenance for 3 hours, on February 24th, 2024, between 17:00 UTC and 20:00 UTC (12:00 EST and 15:00 EST).

Due to this scheduled maintenance, the service will be unavailable during this time.

We apologise for any inconvenience that may be caused.

Thank you. The Sage Team

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sage Business Cloud Accounting Global fera l'objet d'une maintenance système importante le Samedi 24 février 2024, pendant 3 heures entre 18:00 CET et 21:00 CET.

Veuillez noter que vous ne pourrez peut-être pas accéder au service pendant cette période.
Nous nous excusons pour les inconvénients que cela pourrait causer.

Merci L'équipe Sage.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Sage Business Cloud Accounting Global estará en mantenimiento el Sabado 24 de Febrero de 2024, durante 3 horas entre las 18:00 CET y las 21:00 CET.

No se podrá acceder al servicio durante este periodo de tiempo.

Pedimos disculpas por cualquier inconveniente que podamos causar.

Gracias. El equipo de Sage.

item.title: Sage 300 People Managed Services - Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 23, 19:00 - 19:30 UTC

Feb 21, 11:22 UTC
Scheduled - Sage 300 People Managed Services will undergo essential system maintenance on Friday, February 23rd, 2024, for 30 minutes between 21:00 SAST and 21:30 SAST.

Please note that you may experience service interruptions connecting to ESS or API Integrations during this time.
Access to the Sage 300 People application will remain accessible during this time.

We apologise for any inconvenience this may cause.

Thank you.
The Sage Team

item.title: Sage 200 Professional SPC (UKI) - Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 23, 12:00 - 17:00 UTC

Feb 21, 11:39 UTC
Scheduled - Sage 200 Professional SPC (UKI) will undergo essential system maintenance for 5 hours, on February 23rd, 2024, between 12:00 UTC and 17:00 UTC.

We will be updating the 2024 R1 version of Sage 200 Professional into the Sage Provisioning Portal.

During this scheduled time, please kindly do not attempt any new deployments of the product.

Once the maintenance window is completed, all new deployments via the Sage Provisioning Portal will use the latest Sage 200 Professional 2024 R1 version.

Please be aware that this upload of the latest version will not automatically update existing customers using Sage 200 Professional SPC (UKI) deployed via the SPC program on the Sage Provisioning Portal. Sage 200 Standard (UKI) will be not impacted for this scheduled maintenance.

We apologise for any inconvenience this may cause.

Thank you. The Sage Team

item.title: Sage Business Cloud Accounting (UKI) - Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Feb 22, 23:00 UTC  -  Feb 23, 02:00 UTC

Feb 19, 12:15 UTC
Scheduled - Sage Business Cloud Accounting (UKI) will be undergoing maintenance on Thursday, February 22nd, 2023, for 3 hours, between 23:00 UTC and 02:00 UTC, on February 23rd.

Due to this scheduled maintenance, the below services will be unavailable during this time:

• Sage Business Cloud Accounting (UKI)
• Maxwell GAC and MSO worker
• Trial Balance worker
• Accounting index worker
• GAC instances for all arrays (Frontend, API, SQS, etc)
• Addons
• MSO
• File Library Service

We apologise for any inconvenience that may be caused.

Thank you. The Sage Team

item.title: Compliance Service - Operational
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 16:23 UTC
Resolved - This issue is resolved. All services continue to perform as expected.

Feb 20, 15:48 UTC
Monitoring - Our third-party, HMRC, has confirmed that the issue has been resolved, and HMRC MTD (Making Tax Digital) functionality for Sage Partner Edition (VAT Centre), Sage Personal Tax (Personal Tax Viewer), Sage Business Cloud Accounting UK (MTD VAT Submissions), Sage X3 Single Tenant, Sage 200 Standard (UKI) and Sage 200 Professional SPC (UKI) are performing as expected.

We will continue to monitor closely.

Feb 20, 12:53 UTC
Identified - We identified an (intermittent) issue preventing customers from using HMRC MTD (Making Tax Digital) functionality in the products listed below:

- Sage Partner Edition (VAT Centre)
- Sage Personal Tax (Personal Tax Viewer)
- Sage Business Cloud Accounting UK (MTD VAT Submissions)
- Sage X3 Single Tenant
- Sage 200 Standard (UKI)
- Sage 200 Professional SPC (UKI)

Customers will be presented with an internal HTTP 500/504/499 error when attempting to submit.
We are engaged with our third-party, HMRC, waiting for updates.

Feb 20, 12:43 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating a potential issue with the service. An update will be provided within 30 minutes.

item.title: Brightpearl - Retail
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 15:48 UTC
Resolved - The issue is resolved and the service is available and performing as expected.

Feb 19, 15:25 UTC
Monitoring - The service is performing as expected. Avoiding a reoccurrence is our priority as we closely monitor the service.

Feb 19, 11:56 UTC
Update - We are continuing to investigate the cause of the issue. Thank you for your patience.

Feb 19, 10:04 UTC
Update - We have identified that some customers in Australia, US and New Zealand are experiencing slowness when using the service and a small subset of them will be unable to log in.

We are currently investigating.

Feb 19, 09:51 UTC
Investigating - We are investigating a potential issue with the service. An update will be provided within 30 minutes.

item.title: Sage Business Cloud Accounting (UKI) - Scheduled Maintenance
item.content:encoded:
Feb 21, 02:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 20, 23:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 16, 15:06 UTC
Scheduled - Sage Business Cloud Accounting (UKI) will be undergoing maintenance on Tuesday, February 20th, 2024, for 3 hours, between 23:00 UTC and 02:00 UTC, on February 21st. .

Due to this scheduled maintenance, the below services will be unavailable during this time:

• Stripe functionality in GAC will be unavailable.
• The Banking page in GAC will be unavailable (if the customer has activated Stripe).
• Stripe worker and service will be unavailable. Any postings from Stripe will be handled when these services are available.

We apologise for any inconvenience that may be caused.

Thank you. The Sage Team

item.content:encoded:
Feb 19, 09:00 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Feb 16, 17:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Feb 2, 14:31 UTC
Scheduled - Scheduled maintenance is taking place at HMRC on the Making Tax Digital for VAT & ITSA service.

Due to scheduled maintenance, you will be unable to access the following services:

- MTD ITSA –> from 17:00 UTC on Friday, February 16th, to 09:00 UTC on Monday, February 19th, 2024.

- MTD VAT –> from 15:45 UTC to 23:45 UTC on Saturday, February 17th and from 07:00 UTC to 22:30 UTC on Sunday, February 18th, 2024

We apologise for any inconvenience this may cause.

Thanks. The Sage team.

item.title: Sage 200 Standard (UKI) - Recent Update Information
item.content:encoded:
Feb 15, 08:55 UTC
Resolved - Please follow the instructions in this thread if you have issues with the product following the recent update.

Feb 13, 07:07 UTC
Identified - Sage 200 Standard (UKI) has been recently updated.

Please, when accessing your Sage solution for the first time, after the recent update, you will be prompted to download the update to access this new release. You will need appropriate permissions on your machine to complete the installation, so it is advisable to ensure you have this in place – this may mean contacting your IT provider.

Kindly find more details in this LINK.

Thank you, The Sage Team
